ARROW.description: The bullet will be a minecraft projectile

BLOCK.description: The bullet will be a block

SMALLBLOCK.description: The bullet will be a small block

ITEM.description: The bullet will be an item

MOB.description: The bullet will be a mob. If a Mythicmobs, it will retain its skills

TRACKING.description: The bullet will be an item, but its rotation will be adjusted depending on the projectile's direction

REALTRACKING.description: As above, but a real armor stand will also be spawned instead of a packet

DISPLAY.description: The projectile will be a display entity

TEXT.description: The projectile will display a line of text

ME.description: The projectile will be a ModelEngine model
